Package boundary

Class StudentBoundary

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.UserBoundary
boundary.StudentBoundary
public class StudentBoundary extends UserBoundary
Student's application interface after logging in. Can only be viewed by a Student user.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Si Ming Zhou

      Constructor for StudentBoundary class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • displayMenuChoices

      public void displayMenuChoices()
      Displays the menu choices available for the student user.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword()
      Allows the student user to change their password.

    • viewProjects

      public void viewProjects()
      Displays the list of available projects for the student user.

    • viewRegisteredProject

      public void viewRegisteredProject()
      Displays the registered project of the student user.

    • viewRequestHistory

      public void viewRequestHistory()
      Displays the request history of the current student user by getting the list of requests from the StudentController and passing it to the RequestBoundary.

    • requestAllocation

      public void requestAllocation()
      Handles the request allocation process for the current student user by calling the student controller. Displays available projects and allows the user to select a project to request allocation. Also checks for existing pending requests before allowing the user to submit a new request.

    • requestChangeTitle

      public void requestChangeTitle()
      Handles the request to change the title of the current student user's project by calling the student controller. Checks if the user is registered in a project before allowing the user to submit the request.

    • requestDeallocation

      public void requestDeallocation()
      Handles the request to deallocate the current student user from their registered project by calling the student controller. Checks if the user is registered in a project before allowing the user to submit the request.

    • studentOperations

      public void studentOperations()
      Allows student to perform various operations based on the user input. Displays the available options and executes the corresponding operation based on the user's input.
